sentences.english: The razing of slums has added to the number of homeless, and dozens have died from exposure to the cold, literally freezing to death.
sentences.chinese: 对贫民窟的铲除也增加了无家可归者的人数。
请把贫民窟的人看成拓荒者。

sentences.english: Several boys try to catch a glimpse of a cockfight in the tannery section of the slums.
sentences.chinese: 几个男孩正设法在贫民窟制革作坊里看斗鸡。

sentences.english: Brazil spends trillions and can't solve the problem of the favelas.
sentences.chinese: 巴西耗资无数，仍然无法解决贫民窟的问题。

sentences.english: She declaimed against the high rents in slums.
sentences.chinese: 她激烈抨击贫民窟中昂贵的房租。
贫民窟是常发生犯罪的地方。

sentences.english: What do you think can be done to improve the conditions of slum children? Balram Adiga, SINGAPORE.
sentences.chinese: 你认为怎样才能改善贫民窟儿童的状况？

sentences.english: Adouble-snub for this raw slum classic.
sentences.chinese: 这部描写贫民窟原生态的经典影片被两次冷落。

sentences.english: Slums can't be bulldozed away overnight to build a theme park.
sentences.chinese: 贫民窟一晚上不能用推土机推平来建立一个主题公园。

sentences.english: However , this will be clearly unable to account for the vandalism prevailing among some slums or ghettoes.
sentences.chinese: 然而这种假设无法解释贫民窟中普遍的恶意行为。

sentences.english: Today, 55 per cent of Bombay people live in shanties , slums and on pavements.
sentences.chinese: 今天，55%的孟买人生活棚屋，贫民窟或马路上。

sentences.english: Yesterday Slumdog Millionaire was the unexpected winner of the Best Picture Oscar.
sentences.chinese: 昨天《贫民窟的百万富翁》爆冷赢得奥斯卡最佳影片。

sentences.english: Slum tourism is taking off in Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 贫民窟之游在肯尼亚正处于起步阶段。

sentences.english: He connects easilywithblack slum -dwellers and white tycoons alike.
sentences.chinese: 他一样方便的联系黑人贫民窟居民与白人大亨。

sentences.english: The dingy and insanitary environment in the shantytown is a breeding ground for crime.
sentences.chinese: 贫民窟的环境既脏暗又不卫生，是罪恶孳生的温床。

sentences.english: The money will be use to educate five thousand  slum children over the next five years.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱将解决五千个贫民窟孩子五年内的教育问题。

definition: The Bronx, borough of New York City/Bronx County (coextensive with The Bronx)/also written 布朗士
